intro.paragraph1: I'm Anastasiia, a professional photographer and videographer originally from Ukraine, now based in Europe. I work with individuals and businesses, creating authentic, elegant, and emotionally powerful imagery.
intro.paragraph2: My goal is to capture your precious moments and create visual content that highlights your personality, your brand, or your event.
intro.paragraph3: My style: natural, modern, and refined. My approach: to understand your needs and transform your ideas into images that tell your story.

cta.title: Stay Connected
cta.subtitle: Follow my latest work, behind-the-scenes moments, and photography insights on Instagram
